name: billing-made-easy
description: World-class E-Commerce Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:product" "npm run dev:cart" "npm run dev:order" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../product-service && npm install && cd ../cart-service && npm install && cd ../order-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../product-service && npm run build && cd ../cart-service && npm run build && cd ../order-service && npm run build && cd ../payment-service && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../product-service && npm test && cd ../cart-service && npm test && cd ../order-service && npm test && cd ../payment-service && npm test && cd ../user-service && npm test

author: baljinderwal
